post:
Good Afternoon LowEndTalk.

This offer is being launched to celebrate the 2nd UK location RapidSwitch Maidenhead.

NECS is a long established IT Company, we are UK Registered with office based staff who are ready to help you when you need it. We offer friendly telephone and ticket based support, we are also SPLA Partners.

World Class UK Based KVM Hosting on Premium Hardware with Maximum Resources

★ SERVER INFORMATION ★
E3-1270 CPU's
32 GB DDR3 ECC RAM
RAID 10 Enterprise SAS Drives
Hardware Raid Controller with BBU
Backup Space in separate Data Centre
All Servers are UK based with Gigabit uplinks
★ NEVER OVERSOLD ★

Linux and Windows packages available

==========================================

**Package Details: Starter 1 (KVM)**

1 x vCPU cores
256 MB RAM
15 GB HDD (Raid 10)
700 GB Transfer
1 x IP4
5 x IP6 (Available as of February 26th)
Self managed
Instant Setup
Full root access
SolusVM Control Panel
15GB Free offsite backup space (On request)

£3.00 p/month (USD $4.65)

Order Link for Starter 1: https://www.necs.co.uk/clients/cart.php?a=add&pid=1

LowEndTalk Discount Code: LETRS256

See add-on's below for a cheap upgrade of disk space and RAM.

==========================================

**ADDONS:**
- **For a this offer only upgrade to 512 MB ram for just £2.50 p/month extra and you will also get double disk space on request along with this add-on**
- DirectAdmin Licence - £4.99pm
- UK Based Servers – Never Oversold
- 7 Day Money back guarantee
- Payments: PayPal | **Google Checkout **
- VAT @ 20% applies to EU Customers only.

**SPECIAL OFFER NOTES:**
- This is available for new orders only current customers cannot move on to this package however current customers can order it as an additional package if you want to do that.

While windows if offered free please note that attempting to install windows on limited RAM may cause your VPS to blue screen, so is not suitable for anything under 768MB for 2008 Standard edition

IPv4 TEST IP: http://95.154.217.3/100mb.bin
IPv6 TEST IP: available 26th Feb

HUGE selection of Linux ISO's and auto install templates plus option to upload custom ISO’s and Custom Plans
